data.title: Mike Brewer's Workshop - Video Case Study
data.meta_description: In this short video series, we delve into the transformation of Mike Brewer's Workshop from start to finish, presented by Katie.
data.text:
In this short video series, we delve into the transformation of Mike Brewer's Workshop from start to finish, presented by Katie.

Mike Brewer, a renowned host of the popular UK car restoration show Wheeler Dealers, guides the transformation of classic cars, refurbishing them within a budget before selling them to new owners. Needing help with an entirely different kind of restoration, Mike called in help from Resincoat. This mini-web series chronicles the renovation project:

Part One: The Preparation

Part Two: The Shot-Blasting Process

Part Three: Priming The Floor

Part Four: Applying the Resincoat Epoxy Screed
